bibl.title: Examination and Conservation Treatment of a Roman Leather Cuirass in the Collection of the Kelsey Museum of Archaeology.
Karanis Revealed. Discovering the Past and Present of a Michigan Excavation in Egypt

bibl.note: Inv. KM 3631. - Description of the Armor. - Construction Overview. - Treatment and Storage History. - Condition of the Leather. - Assessment and Treatment. - Tanning Identification. - Investigation of the Red Color. - Future Research.
bibl.seg: Claudia Chemello, Examination and Conservation Treatment of a Roman Leather Cuirass in the Collection of the Kelsey Museum of Archaeology.

Terry G. Wilfong (ed.), with the assistance of Andrew W.S. Ferrara, Karanis Revealed. Discovering the Past and Present of a Michigan Excavation in Egypt = Kelsey Museum Publication 7 (Ann Arbor, 2014) pp. 129-139, figg. 44-47.
